1:
Yahweh, do not correct me when you are angry with me;\q2 do not punish me when you are upset.
\q1
2:
Yahweh, act kindly toward me and heal me because I have become weak.\q2 My body shakes because I am experiencing so much sorrow.


\q1
3:
Yahweh, I am greatly troubled in my inner being.\q2 How long must I endure this?
\q1
4:
Yahweh, please come and rescue me.\q2 Save me because you always keep the promises of your covenant.
\q1
5:
I will not be able to praise you after I die;\q2 no one in the place where the dead are praise you.



\q1
6:
I am exhausted because of my pain.\q2 I cry all night long so that my bed and my pillow are drenched by my tears.
\q1
7:
Because I cry so much, I cannot see well.\q2 My eyes have become weak because I constantly cry in fear of my enemies.



\q1
8:
You people who do evil things, get away from me,\q2 because Yahweh heard me when I was crying!
\q1
9:
Yahweh heard me when I called out for him to help me,\q2 and he will answer my prayer.
\q1
10:
When that happens, all my enemies will be ashamed;\q2 they will be the ones who are terrified.
\q1 They will turn away from me and suddenly leave me
\q2 because they will be disgraced.
